The spirituall-mans aime guiding a Christian in his affections and actions, through the sundry passages of this life, so that Gods glory, and his owne salvation may be the maine end of all / by the faithfull and reverend divine, R. Sibbes ... ; published by T.G. and P.N. Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.
[2], 84, [8] p.
Printed by Iohn Norton, for Iohn Rothwell, and are to be sold at the Sunne in Pauls church-yard, London : 1637.
Title in double line border. Signatures: A-D¹² (last leaf blank). Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
